thread.title: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte confident of keeping Eden Hazard away from Real Madrid – declaring: ‘We are happy with him and he is happy with us’

author: aterrell
title: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte confident of keeping Eden Hazard away from Real Madrid – declaring: ‘We are happy with him and he is happy with us’
text:
EFL Eden nowhere Chelsea boss Antonio Conte confident of keeping Eden Hazard away from Real Madrid – declaring: ‘We are happy with him and he is happy with us’ 
Blues gaffer wants Belgian superstar to continue to build on what they have at Stamford Bridge By Alex Terrell 31st March 2017, 2:35 pm Updated: 31st March 2017, 3:01 pm
